scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd backend && npm run build" "cd frontend && npm run build"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.docker:build: npm run docker:clean && docker build -t camo ./backend
scripts.docker:start: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:run
